review: Was seeking for warranty on my 25 ft tape measure during almost closing hour. Both staff was super friendly and helpful. Happy with outcome and a brand new tape measure!
name: Leanne Graham

review: Great experience here at this service Center.  Staff were quick and efficient and took in my items that needed service, and ordered a replacement after diagnosing problem.  They said 6-8 week turnaround time, but was surprised when I was contacted within the second week.  Collected my new tool without any issues.
name: Ervin Howell

review: Today I bought a carbon brush assembly, I am very happy with the service and the price. Very nice people. A great place to shop for Milwaukee tools and parts. Thanks.
name: Clementine Bauch
